fun_fact.response: Did you know that an octopus has three hearts? Two pump blood to the gills, while the third pumps it to the rest of the body!

hindi_fun_fact.response: Kya aapko pata hai ki ek octopus ke teen dil hote hain? Do uske gills tak khoon pahunchate hain aur ek poore sharir me!
